Listen to the sound of the letter \"%1$s\" and the words that contain it and memorize them.
Select the picture behind which the word with the letter \"%1$s\" is hidden.
Opposite each picture, put the corresponding word.\n To get a hint, click on the picture.

Use the letters of the alphabet to write the correct word.
 To check the word, press ✓.
 To delete a character, press ←.
 To get a hint, press the picture.
Select the letter the speaker pronounces.\n Click the sound icon to listen to the letter again.
Choose the word that matches the picture.
Fill in the blanks with matching letters, words, and pictures.
Go through all the letters of the Nivkh alphabet and come back here again!

The educational application “Nivkh Alphabet” offers children interesting and understandable tasks about letters. Thanks to cheerful and bright pictures, the child will easily learn all the letters of the Nivkh alphabet. Simple interface and sound accompaniment will allow him to do without your help. After completing all the tasks, the student will be able to get a personalized diploma.

The project “45 Years of the Nivkh Alphabet” was implemented by the Nogliki Central Model Library named after V.M. Sangi. V.M. Sangi Central Model Library of Nogliki, Dominanta Information and Cultural Enlightenment Center with the support of Sakhalin Energy LLC.
